column5: Ya I lied...                                                                                 It's been a great year in my boat so far! Special thanks to my full time fishing buddy/part time friend. There's more but I figured I would just post some of them.    Cheers, Ron...
Slow clap. I was impressed with the specks and then it got even better! Thanks for sharing, thats a great year in any boat.
Howah!!!
We all knew it wasn't the fish that would be ugly!!
Wow, that's an incredible year.
Show off!!
Great year for you guys so far Ron, hope it get's even better.
ewww. How am I supposed to keep my breakfast down after seeing that?
Well done Ron, very impressive.
hideous post
Well that then sure is one horde of nasty ghouls and goblins you've been out scaring up.  You should haunt us with these kinda posts more often.  Great fishing Ron & Keith.
all i can say is woooooooooooooooooooooow im jealous now
Well them cats are kinda ugly. Those Trooots are sure perdy though.
Some very ugly but impressive fish business going on in your boat Ron !!!! Lol ...haha .... Wow !!!! Some real beauty specimens there !!!! Tight-lines ...cheers
nice fish..pretty fish so  you forgot the "erman" in the title
Very nice , you had a great year
Great line up of trophys. Well done!
More pics then words in that post....  39 pics and 38 words...  With pics like that words aren't really needed... Multi species master....
Exactly what I was thinking

Thanks for the replies and comments everyone. I am at the stage of my life where the kids have all "growed" up now. No grand kids, only our youngest daughter's lizard to take care of. Some how she forgot to pack that up when she moved out. My wife is and always has been a "home body", she would much rather do her quilting and read her murder mystery books than to go somewhere. So this leaves time for me to get out as often as I can. There's a neighborhood joke going around, something like "It's awe full nice of you to move the boat so your wife can cut the grass under it".   A change in my business has taken away some fishing opportunities, but in the same token, has encouraged me to take more than just 2 weeks holidays a year.  I'm glad I did!
Awesome pix!  Thanx for showing off! LOL I agree - mighty fine of you to move the boat so wifey can cut the grass.  She must be busy cutting grass 7 days a week??
You need to rethink your definition of ugly.
A lot of trophys for sure , congrats on a great year so far !

Dang you have had a killer year. Oh wait I have to see them picks each time your over just tempting me to give up musky fishing for some of the colourful fishies.  Congrats to you and the chatter box there Ronnie you guys put in alot of time for them fish congrats
